Package model.availability

Class Availability

java.lang.Object
model.availability.Availability
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Copyable, SerializableCopyable
public class Availability extends Object implements SerializableCopyable
Represents the availability of a user.
Since:
2024-11-17

  • Method Details

    • setAvailability

      public void setAvailability(DayOfWeek day, TimePeriod timePeriod)
      Sets the availability of the user on a specific day.
      Parameters:
      day - the day of the week.
      timePeriod - the time period.

    • setAvailability

      public void setAvailability(LocalDate date, TimePeriod timePeriod)
      Sets the availability of the user on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date.
      timePeriod - the time period.

    • getAvailability

      public TimePeriod getAvailability(DayOfWeek day)
      Retrieves the general availability for a given day of the week.
      Parameters:
      day - the DayOfWeek for which the general availability is being fetched.
      Returns:
      the TimePeriod representing the availability for the given day.

    • getAvailability

      public TimePeriod getAvailability(LocalDate date)
      Retrieves the availability for a specific date. If a specific availability for the date exists, it will be returned. Otherwise, the general availability for the corresponding day of the week is returned.
      Parameters:
      date - the LocalDate for which the availability is being fetched.
      Returns:
      the TimePeriod representing the availability for the given date.

    • getGeneralAvailability

      public Map<DayOfWeek,TimePeriod> getGeneralAvailability()
      Retrieves the general availability for a given day of the week.
      Returns:
      the TimePeriod representing the availability for the given day.

    • getSpecificAvailability

      public Map<LocalDate,TimePeriod> getSpecificAvailability()
      Retrieves the specific availability for a given date.
      Returns:
      the TimePeriod representing the availability for the given date.

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable(TimeSlot slot)
      Checks if the user is available at a given time slot.
      Parameters:
      slot - the time slot.
      Returns:
      true if the user is available at the given time slot, false otherwise.

    • copy

      public Availability copy()
      Creates a copy of the current Availability instance.
      Specified by:
      copy in interface Copyable
      Returns:
      the exact copy (shallow) of the Availability.
